00023 #ifndef Eval_Diff_VDF_const_included
00024 #define Eval_Diff_VDF_const_included
00025 
00026 #include <Eval_Diff_VDF.h>
00027 #include <Champ_Face.h>
00028 #include <Champ_base.h>
00029 #include <Ref_Champ_Uniforme.h>
00030 #include <Champ_Uniforme.h>
00031 #include <Zone_VDF.h>
00032 class Champ_base;
00033 
00034 // 
00035 //
00036 //
00037 //
00038 //
00039 //! class Eval_Diff_VDF_const<br>Cette classe represente un evaluateur de flux diffusif<br>avec un coefficient de diffusivite qui est isotrope<br>et constant en espace.
00040 
00041 /** \sa Evaluateur_VDF */
00042 
00043 
00044 class Eval_Diff_VDF_const : public Eval_Diff_VDF
00045 
00046 {
00047 public:
00048   inline Eval_Diff_VDF_const() :db_diffusivite(-1.0e+300) {}
00049   inline void associer(const Champ_base& diffu)
00050   {
00051     diffusivite_ = ref_cast(Champ_Uniforme, diffu);
00052     db_diffusivite = diffusivite_.valeur()(0,0);
00053   }
00054 
00055   inline void mettre_a_jour()
00056   {
00057     db_diffusivite = diffusivite_.valeur()(0,0);
00058   }
00059 
00060   inline const Champ_base& get_diffusivite() const
00061   {
00062     assert(diffusivite_.non_nul());
00063     return diffusivite_.valeur();
00064   }
00065 
00066 // Methods used by the flux computation in template class:
00067   inline double nu_1_impl(int i, int compo) const { return db_diffusivite; }
00068   inline double nu_2_impl(int i, int compo) const { return db_diffusivite; }
00069   inline double compute_heq_impl(double d0, int i, double d1, int j, int compo) const { return db_diffusivite/(d0+d1); }
00070   inline double nu_1_impl_face(int i, int j, int compo) const { return db_diffusivite; }
00071   inline double nu_2_impl_face(int i, int j, int k, int l, int compo) const { return db_diffusivite; }
00072   inline double nu_lam_impl_face(int i, int j, int k, int l, int compo) const { return nu_2_impl_face(i,j,k,l,compo); }
00073   inline double nu_lam_impl_face2(int i, int j, int compo) const { return nu_1_impl_face(i,j,compo); }
00074   inline double nu_t_impl(int i, int compo) const { return 0.; }
00075   inline double tau_tan_impl(int i, int j) const { return 0.; }
00076   inline bool uses_wall() const { return false; }
00077   inline bool uses_mod() const { return false; }
00078   inline DoubleTab get_k_elem() const { return 0.; }
00079 
00080 protected:
00081   REF(Champ_Uniforme) diffusivite_;
00082   double db_diffusivite;
00083 };
00084 
00085 #endif /* Eval_Diff_VDF_const_included */
